4.name: TASK_COMMENT_EMAIL
4.subject: New Comment added

${comment.createdBy.name} has  added a new comment in your workorder ${workorder.subject} . Please view the workorder here - ${workorder.url} to reply/view the comments.

Regards,
Team Facilio.

5.name: ALARM_CREATION_EMAIL
5.subject: New Alarm raised

6.name: ALARM_CREATION_SMS
6.message:
[${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [NEW Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.severity.severity}" Alarm reported for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.

 - Team Facilio.

7.name: ALARM_UPDATION_SMS
7.message:
[${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [UPDATED Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.previousSeverity.severity}" Alarm updated to "${alarm.severity.severity}" for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.

 - Team Facilio.

notification.text: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [NEW Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.severity.severity}" Alarm reported for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.
notification.title: New Alarm

data.text: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [NEW Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.severity.severity}" Alarm reported for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.
data.title: New Alarm

notification.text: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [UPDATED Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.previousSeverity.severity}" Alarm updated to "${alarm.severity.severity}" for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.
notification.title: New Alarm

data.text: [${alarm.modifiedTimeString}] [UPDATED Alarm:#ID${alarm.id}] "${alarm.previousSeverity.severity}" Alarm updated to "${alarm.severity.severity}" for source "${alarm.source}". Alarm message: "${alarm.subject}". State: ${alarm.state}.
data.title: New Alarm
